description: At the conclusion of the 1st Neo-Zeon war, the Mineva found by the AEUG declares herself a fake â€” Bright Noa concludes that the real Mineva had gone missing since the end of the Gryps Conflict, and as such Haman had been using a stand-in throughout the course of the Neo-Zeon conflict.
name: Mineva Lao Zabi
